dublin_core.dcvalue: mHealth Alliance Publication To celebrate Universal Children s Day 2013 this report was commissioned by Sesame Workshop and the mHealth Alliance to achieve two objectives 1 to explore current and future opportunities in the use of mobile phones and other relevant information and communications technologies ICTs for improving the health and development of young children as investments for a better future and 2 to provide guidance and recommendations for partnerships institutions or organizations interested in contributing to this field Nov 2014
Getting Healthier Around the World: Information and Communication Technologies for Child Health and Development
